Detailed Description

Provides a base class definition for streaming back messages to the parent process.

Member Function Documentation

void MessageStream::SetLevel ( int  level  )  [inline]

Set the level of verbosity desired. 0 == no messages 1 == normal messages, 2,3,4, etc. == more verbose.

Parameters:
level - level of verbosity desired.

int MessageStream::verbosity [protected]
